args.new_str:
# Implements Eq. (4) in the paper: L_centri = max(||e+||_c - ||e||_c + margin, 0)
        norm_anchor = self.manifold.dist0(rep_anchor)
        norm_positive = self.manifold.dist0(rep_positive)
        loss = torch.clamp(norm_positive - norm_anchor + self.margin, min=0.0)
        return loss.mean()
